EmailTemplate.description: Email template to use before a meeting with a prospective client.
EmailTemplate.name: Pre-First Meeting Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Livongo + [CLIENT] Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I'm really looking forward to spending some time learning more about [purpose] at [prospect] and talking about how Livongo can support your efforts on [Date, Time, Location].
To give you some background before we meet, Livongo has pioneered Applied Health Signals, and I've attached an overview to show you how our AI+AI engine uniquely positions Livongo to change member behavior. Our approach currently reaches over 600 clients, 4 of the 7 largest payers, providers, and the two largest PBM - and we're improving health outcomes for members and saving money for our partners and clients.
You should see two attachments. Livongo Company Overview Applied Health Signals Overview
The meeting attendees are: [Livongo Attendee, Title, Livongo] [Livongo Attendee, Title, Livongo] [Consultant Attendee, Title, Consultant] [Client Attendee, Title, Company]
Agenda: Introductions Livongo Overview and Demo; 30-45 min Discussion and Next Steps: 15 min
For our meeting only, if you could share the cell phone numbers of those who will be in the meeting, I can integrate them into our Livongo demo.
Thank you and looking forward to our meeting!
Best, [Insert Email Signature]
